downloadTitle: Microsoft Solution for Hosted Messaging and Collaboration 3.5
downloadDescription: Microsoft Solution for Hosted Messaging and Collaboration 3.5 hosting service providers with tools, tested best practices, scripts, and code samples designed to efficiently deploy messaging and collaboration services on multi tenant servers.

downloadFile.name: Hosted Messaging and Collaboration Disaster Recovery Guide.zip
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/d/2/0/d208b5e7-aabe-4381-b681-95f664283917/Hosted Messaging and Collaboration Disaster Recovery Guide.zip

detailsSection: Microsoft Solution for Hosted Messaging and Collaboration 3.5 offers hosting service providers with tools, tested best practices, scripts, and code samples designed to efficiently deploy messaging and collaboration services on multi tenant servers. The solution provides both automated and manual procedures for deploying, running and operating a hosted environment.
detailsSection_file_name: Hosted Messaging and Collaboration Disaster Recovery Guide.zip
installInstructionSection:
To install this download
Click the Download button and follow directions on your screen.
Further installation requirements will depend on what you choose to deploy and on how you deploy. Please see the documentation for Microsoft Solution for Hosted Messaging and Collaboration 3.5 for further information.
